claims.object: direct binding to the α1 subunit of Ca V 2 channels

surface_layer.definition: The G protein βγ dimer is a subunit of heterotrimeric G proteins that is released upon GPCR activation and participates in downstream signaling.

deep_layer.mechanism: Gβγ binds to CaV2 channels to modulate their activity.
deep_layer.origin: Released from G proteins following GPCR activation.
